name: React Native Background Geolocation
body:
This is a React Native implementation of our popular [Cordova Background Geolocation](http://transistorsoft.github.io/cordova-background-geolocation/) plugin, a sophisticated, battery-conscious location-management component for both **iOS** & **Android**.

[Github](https://github.com/transistorsoft/react-native-background-geolocation)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
